messages.text: Good evening. Hope I'm not disturbing you.
Hello. No, it's fine. Do I know you?
I don't think so. I'm Chen. I'm a programmer living in Hong Kong. I enjoy connecting with people from different cultures. Your profile seemed interesting.
Good evening, Anita. How was your day? I hope it was as lovely as you are.
It was busy. Hello Chen.
You work so hard. You should relax. I had a very profitable day. My side-project in forex trading did very well.
Are you awake, my dear Anita? I can't sleep. I keep thinking about our conversation.
Wow, it's late. I was just about to sleep.
I'm sorry. I just feel so comfortable talking to you. You are a very good listener. It's rare to find someone so genuine.
I made another great profit today! Over $5000. I feel so blessed. I want to share my luck with you.
That's amazing, congrats.
It's not luck, it's a system. A data-driven strategy. I have been developing it. It's my secret.
Anita, I have been thinking. Our meeting was not an accident. I feel we have a future. I want to build a life with someone special. Someone like you.
Chen, we've only been talking for a few days.
Time is not important when the feeling is real. I want to help you achieve your dreams. I can teach you my trading method. We can become rich together and travel the world.
Are you ready to change your life, my love?
I'm not a gambler.
This is not gambling, it's a science. I will show you. Just open an account on this platform, 'MetaGold'. I will give you a small signal to test. You will see. Trust me.
Okay, I created an account.
Wonderful! Now, deposit $200. I will tell you exactly when to buy and sell. You will see a 20% return in one hour. It's a guarantee.
Wow, it worked! My balance is $240!

Of course it did, my love! I told you. Now, imagine if you invested more? There is a big market event happening tomorrow. A once-in-a-year opportunity. We should invest at least $10,000 for maximum profit.
That is too much money for me.
You must think bigger for our future! This is a sure thing. Don't you want to be financially free with me? You must deposit it immediately before the market opens.
Don't let fear hold you back from our destiny. I will be right here with you.
